alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 02 at 2:06PM PDT until May 03 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior
